'''17w47b''' is the seventh [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.13]], released on November 23, 2017<ref>{{snap|17w47a|November 23, 2017}}</ref>, and was released to fix some of the bugs in the [[17w47a]] snapshot.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Bark]] '''
* Can now be crafted.
